languages.text: {n}Конечно, на окраинах городов регулярно случались эксцессы — дикие воины пустошей охочи до грабежа, и слухи о мелкий стычках между ними и улейными гильдиями время от времени будоражат народ.{/n}

{n}Of course, the outskirts of the cities remain prone to incident — the savage warriors of the wastelands are always eager to raid, and rumours of petty skirmishes between them and the hive guilds regularly give the people cause to worry.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Конечно, на окраинах городов регулярно случались эксцессы — дикие воины пустошей охочи до грабежа, и слухи о мелкий стычках между ними и улейными гильдиями время от времени будоражат народ.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Of course, outrage was regular on the outskirts of the cities — the wild warriors of the wastelands are always eager for the looting, and the rumours of petty skirmishes between them and the hive guilds shock the people occasionally.{/n}

{n}Of course, outrage was regular on the outskirts of the cities — the wild warriors of the wastelands are always eager for the looting, and the rumours of petty skirmishes between them and the hive guilds shock the people occasionally.{/n}

{n}Of course, the outskirts of the cities remain prone to incident — the savage warriors of the wastelands are always eager to raid, and rumours of petty skirmishes between them and the hive guilds regularly give the people cause to worry.{/n}

{n}Of course, the outskirts of the cities embody a more untamed spirit— the wild warriors of the wastelands are always eager to raid, and rumours of petty skirmishes between them and the hive guilds occasionally capture the people's interest.{/n}

{n}Of course, the outskirts of the cities embody a more untamed spirit— the wild warriors of the wastelands are always eager to raid, and rumours of petty skirmishes between them and the hive guilds occasionally capture the people's interest.{/n}

{n}Of course, the outskirts of the cities remain prone to incident — the savage warriors of the wastelands are always eager to raid, and rumours of petty skirmishes between them and the hive guilds regularly give the people cause to worry.{/n}

{n}Of course, the outskirts of the cities remain prone to incident — the savage warriors of the wastelands are always eager to raid, and rumours of petty skirmishes between them and the hive guilds regularly give the people cause to worry.{/n}

{n}Of course, the outskirts of the cities remain prone to incident — the savage warriors of the wastelands are always eager to raid, and rumours of petty skirmishes between them and the hive guilds regularly give the people cause to worry.{/n}

languages.text: {n}然而，城郊区域的生活方式依然充满了暴力冲突。那些生活在废土上的野蛮战士总是渴望袭击巢都。有传言说，他们时常与巢都公会之间发生小规模冲突，这样的传言总是会让人们忧心忡忡。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Of course, the outskirts of the cities remain prone to incident — the savage warriors of the wastelands are always eager to raid, and rumours of petty skirmishes between them and the hive guilds regularly give the people cause to worry.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}然而，城郊区域的生活方式依然充满了暴力冲突。那些生活在废土上的野蛮战士总是渴望袭击巢都。有传言说，他们时常与巢都公会之间发生小规模冲突，这样的传言总是会让人们忧心忡忡。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Por supuesto, las afueras de las ciudades siguen siendo propensas a incidencias de todo tipo. Los guerreros salvajes de los páramos siempre quieren hacer incursiones, y los rumores de pequeñas escaramuzas entre ellos y los gremios de la colmena dan motivos a la gente para preocuparse con frecuencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Of course, the outskirts of the cities remain prone to incident — the savage warriors of the wastelands are always eager to raid, and rumours of petty skirmishes between them and the hive guilds regularly give the people cause to worry.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Por supuesto, las afueras de las ciudades siguen siendo propensas a incidencias de todo tipo. Los guerreros salvajes de los páramos siempre quieren hacer incursiones, y los rumores de pequeñas escaramuzas entre ellos y los gremios de la colmena dan motivos a la gente para preocuparse con frecuencia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}もちろん、都市の郊外には、より野蛮な精神が体現されている...ウエストランドのワイルドな戦士たちは常に奇襲に明け暮れる。そいつらのハイヴギルドとの間の些細な小競り合いの噂は、人民を心配する。。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Of course, the outskirts of the cities remain prone to incident — the savage warriors of the wastelands are always eager to raid, and rumours of petty skirmishes between them and the hive guilds regularly give the people cause to worry.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}もちろん、都市の郊外には、より野蛮な精神が体現されている...ウエストランドのワイルドな戦士たちは常に奇襲に明け暮れる。そいつらのハイヴギルドとの間の些細な小競り合いの噂は、人民の関心を引くことも時折ある。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Certes, les abords des villes sont le théâtre d'incidents réguliers... Les guerriers sauvages des terres désolées sont toujours prêts à attaquer, et les rumeurs d'escarmouches avec les guildes de la ruche provoquent souvent l'inquiétude des habitants.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Of course, the outskirts of the cities remain prone to incident — the savage warriors of the wastelands are always eager to raid, and rumours of petty skirmishes between them and the hive guilds regularly give the people cause to worry.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Certes, les abords des villes sont le théâtre d'incidents réguliers... Les guerriers sauvages des terres désolées sont toujours prêts à attaquer, et les rumeurs d'escarmouches avec les guildes de la ruche provoquent souvent l'inquiétude des habitants.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Natürlich leiden die Randgebiete der Städte noch immer an den Folgen des Zwischenfalls – die barbarischen Krieger des Ödlandes sind immer für einen Überfall zu haben, und Gerüchte über kleinere Scharmützel zwischen ihnen und den Gilden der Makropolen geben den Leuten oft Grund zur Sorge.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Of course, the outskirts of the cities remain prone to incident — the savage warriors of the wastelands are always eager to raid, and rumours of petty skirmishes between them and the hive guilds regularly give the people cause to worry.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Natürlich leiden die Randgebiete der Städte noch immer an den Folgen des Zwischenfalls – die barbarischen Krieger des Ödlandes sind immer für einen Überfall zu haben, und Gerüchte über kleinere Scharmützel zwischen ihnen und den Gilden der Makropolen geben den Leuten oft Grund zur Sorge.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Elbette ki şehirlerin dış kısımları, hadise çıkmaya yatkın olmayı sürdürüyor. Çorak toprakların yabani savaşçıları, her daim baskın için can atar. Savaşçılarla kovan loncaları arasındaki ufak tefek çekişmelere dair söylentiler, halkın ilgisini sıklıkla uyandırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Of course, the outskirts of the cities remain prone to incident — the savage warriors of the wastelands are always eager to raid, and rumours of petty skirmishes between them and the hive guilds regularly give the people cause to worry.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Elbette ki şehirlerin dış kısımları, hadise çıkmaya yatkın olmayı sürdürüyor. Çorak toprakların yabani savaşçıları, her daim baskın için can atar. Savaşçılarla kovan loncaları arasındaki ufak tefek çekişmelere dair söylentiler, halkın ilgisini sıklıkla uyandırıyor.{/n}
